Summary: A friend of mine ,his daughter and were standing in a lot on the corner of henderson and hespeler in winnipeg manitoba and witnessed three ufo's in the sky
trends: There have been 43 other sightings in Winnipeg
There were 3 other sightings in Winnipeg on or around July 27th 2005
divs: sighting detailson july 28\2005 at ten minutes after seven oclock p.m. my friends little girl was laying on a cement wall that surrounded the lot that we were standing in.she was looking up at the sky when she asked her father what that was up in the sky.we all looked up at the sky and thought there was a bird floating in the sky.the object that we were looking was blinking and started moving in a north easterly direction towards a jet's exhaust trail when all of a sudden another one popped out of the clouds and was blinking just like the other object that was just beneath the clouds to the the northeast of us.the blinking light that emerged from the clouds started moving towards the other blinking light.these lights seemed to have a bluish haze around them visible from the ground.both blinking lights then flew into the clouds and disappeared from sight.we thought that whatever we had just witnessed had gone and we turned to leave when something shot down from the sky at a phenomenal rate of speed and went behind some trees about two hundred feet from us.the silouette of this object was clearly visible through trees as it came to an unbelievable dead stop behind the trees.the object then began gliding to the right and stopped in an opening in the treeline just above some houses and hovered in frontof my friend and i and his daughter before emitting an extremely bright light and seemingly vanished in front of our eyes.there are three of us that witnessed this craft come down and will take any lie detector test that you may have.when this craft was hovering in front us everything around seemed to come to a standstill,there was no sound of the busy traffic to the right of us.after it left in a bright flash both my friend and i seemed disoriented.i asked my friend what time it was as we crossed the street and he answered that it was seven fourty eight .thirty minutes elapsed as we watched this object hover in the air in one of the busiest intersections without seemingly anyone but the three of us noticing this craft that lit eveything up around us ,including us,it seems.i can assure you that as crazy as this sounds it truly occurred ,i have two witnesses willing to undergo any type of validity test you may have.i would willing undergo hypnosis to prove i am telling the truth .this is so bizarre that i can't believe i am taking the chance of being thought of as crazy by reporting this sighting.my friend and his daughter will verify this happening in the city of winnipeg in broad daylight.i have not been feeling the same since this happened,can't quite explain the feelings of anxiety i have been feeling since this happened.hope this is the first and last time that this ever happens to any of us. any futher questions would preferably be done over the phone.this really happened and i implore that anyone that was in this vicinity on july 28\2005 and witnessed what we did please report it and not fear the ridicule that i expect until verified through whatever means may exist.my questions are did this craft leave any trace evidence.can show the exact spot where this thing hovered over rooftops maybe twenty five feet in the air.was in a clearing between trees .could there be evidence in the trees that it hovered beside.am willing to show exactly where this craft hovered.can also draw photo of what i saw.so can my friend and daughter.
